text: Ana uli ndema jachampatile chipato chanti pakwete pamwapatisye (amagongo ŵenu) chanti iyyoyocho mwa winji wakaŵili mwatite: “Chityochele kwapi achi (chipatochi)?” Jilani: “Chalakwecho chityochele kwa jenumanja mwachimisyene (ligongo lyakunyosya kwenu). Chisimu Allah pa chindu chilichose aŵele Jwakombola
